archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0192
archimate:Requirement.documentation:
As a Credit & Risk Representative I want access to a Credit & Risk - Credit Check queue and dashboard So I can have access orders where a manual credit check is required
Accesptance Criteria: 1) Cases are logged in the queue for manual attention 2) Credit & Risk queue is available for the team specifically 3) Task notifications of when cases enter the queue is available to the team

properties.value: BSS | CRM | Credit & Risk | Manual Credit Check Queue & Dashboard
Automated solution sometimes will not get a clear no or clear yes. In that case a manual assesment is needed.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
